TopicTitle: STRANDED (A Kerbal Space Program Short Film) (Feedback wanted)

Articles.Content: The longest cinematic I'll be making for a while, "STRANDED" is the story of how three survivors of a holiday gone horribly wrong: make it back to Kerbin. Special thanks to this thread for the basic plot of the short film. If you have the time then make sure to give some feedback on the video!

Nassault's cinematic techniques are somewhat overrated, but it's justified.

For yours, it's been good so far. Keep on the good work!
